metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7749 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - high
metadata.Description:
The SSH server implementation of AsyncSSH before 1.12.1 does not properlycheck whether authentication is completed before processing other requests.A customized SSH client can simply skip the authentication step.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7749` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-asyncssh - 1.12.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-asyncssh package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.2-1').
